description:
This year’s Labour Party conference will feature events sponsored by an oil and gas trade group, the owner of the UK’s largest emitting power plant, and a gas distribution company, DeSmog can reveal.  The conference, which is being held from 22 to 25 September in Liverpool, is one of the largest political gatherings in Europe […]

The post Fossil Fuel Lobbyists and Major Polluters to Sponsor Labour Conference Events appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Fossil Fuel Lobbyists and Major Polluters to Sponsor Labour Conference Events
